articles.author: Shannon Najmabadi
articles.title: Musk has a history of acrimonious breakups - The Washington Post
articles.description: Several of tech entrepreneur Elon Musk’s business associates have fallen out with him at some point, though not always permanently.
articles.content: Return to menuMartin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning incorporated Tesla in 2003, but Musk and two other employees are also considered co-founders under the terms of a later lawsuit settlement. Musk, an … [+587 chars]
